QuestData.Title: A Plea From Beyond
QuestData.Description: <You can't make sense of the spirit's urgent plea, but maybe Choluna can decipher what's going on here.>$B$B<Speak with Choluna back inside the shrine!>
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Choluna inside of the Shrine of Aviana in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Choluna inside of the Shrine of Aviana in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: Slow down, $c! You look as though you've seen a ghost...
